Desc.eng: What an honor! The great Van Helsing came to my rescue personally.
I try to save everyone I can.
True. Itâ€™s like an occupational hazard with him.
You have my gratitude. I am the king of the lost and fallen. My subjects will help you in your fight against that evil Fulmigati.
